short_summary: Client Experience Platform (CXP) for the Digital Platform Modernization (DPM) Programm. The PWGSC will seek to award two separate contracts a Software-as-a-Service and a professional services contract.
description: The Public Works and Government Services (PWSG) department is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for a Client Experience Platform (CXP) in support of the Digital Platform Modernization (DPM) Programme. The PWGSC is seeking to award two separate contracts; one contract to a Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) Publisher who will provide access to the Software-as-a-Service, cloud infrastructure, service operations, licensing, support and maintenance. A separate task-based professional services contract to a System Integrator (SI) to configure and implement the CXP into production. Both Contractors must work in partnership to design, develop and implement the CXP.
